ValidationRule.description: When the Lead Source is marketing related, the Lead Source Detail field is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR( ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "Digital Marketing"), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "Hosted Event"), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "Sponsored Event"), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "Website Conversion"), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "Direct Inbound"), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, "AppExchange") ), RecordType.DeveloperName="Contact", ISBLANK(Lead_Source_Detail__c))
